title: Manikyam Diamond Vanki: A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) / American Diamonds. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: This Vanki features a striking square-cut ruby centerpiece surrounded by a dazzling halo of CZ stones. The openwork design showcases intricate floral filigree patterns reminiscent of traditional South Indian jewelry, blending heritage with contemporary aesthetics. The geometric design gives a modern edge. Crafted by skilled artisans.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for modern parties and events where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance.
description: A modern twist on the classic Vanki, this bracelet offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary style. The high-quality ruby and dazzling CZs are sure to turn heads. Durable and designed for comfortable wear. Represents prosperity and good fortune.
